title: Whistleblower alleges Crown casino being used to launder money – video
text: CCTV from Melbourne's Crown Casino shows men casually handing over shopping bags filled with wads of cash to casino staff. The footage has been leaked by three Victorian state gambling inspectors-turned-whistleblowers. They say that a reduced police presence inside the casino is allowing suspected criminals to launder money with impunity. 'You can’t do you job properly. They prefer you to go out and do liquor inspections which take next to nothing than do a proper decent investigation because it’s too time consuming', one whistleblower said. The footage was leaked to independent MP Andrew Wilkie who has been calling for a royal commission into the casino industry
description: CCTV from Melbourne's Crown casino shows men casually handing over shopping bags filled with wads of cash
